title: Friendship & Love Compatibility App
description: React-based compatibility calculator for friendship and love, with interactive forms, dynamic quotes, detailed result pages, and an intimacy likelihood metric.

details.challenge: Designing a user-friendly compatibility experience with consistent inputs and meaningful, explainable scoring across both friendship and love paths.
details.solution: Built a multi-page React flow with structured dropdown inputs and modular utility functions that compute scores and generate tailored advice for results views.
features: Love compatibility calculator (names, zodiac, personality, interests, etc.)
Friendship compatibility calculator with longevity estimate
Ashkarain likelihood metric (opposite-gender only) based on compatibility factors
Randomized love & friendship quotes on pages
Styled result pages with percentages and advice
Reset / Try Again flow to test new inputs

title: ForG Auto ‚Äî Car Dealership Management Platform
description: A production-ready Flutter Web application for managing and showcasing a car dealership inventory, featuring a custom-built admin dashboard, Firestore backend, Cloudinary image hosting, and a responsive client-facing vehicle catalog.

details.challenge: Designing a secure, scalable dealership platform that supports real-time inventory management, image-heavy content, and a protected admin workflow without relying on Firebase Authentication.
details.solution: Implemented a modular Flutter Web architecture with custom admin authentication, Firestore-backed inventory and contact systems, Cloudinary-based image hosting, and responsive layouts optimized for mobile, tablet, and desktop.
features: Custom admin authentication using Firestore (name + phone validation)
Admin dashboard with protected routes and password change flow
Full CRUD operations for vehicle inventory
Cloudinary-based multi-image upload with secure URLs
Client-facing inventory grid with search and advanced filters
Responsive layouts for mobile, tablet, and desktop breakpoints
Lazy-loaded images with "Sold" vehicle badges
Contact form with validation and Firestore submission
Modularized feature-based architecture (data / domain / presentation)
Production-ready deployment via Firebase Hosting or static hosting

title: Airport Web Application (South Africa)
description: Full-stack airport web application for viewing flights, booking tickets, and reading airline-related news, with a strong focus on South African airports, airlines, and localization.

details.challenge: Designing a scalable flight and booking platform that integrates real-time data, authentication, and localized airline content while maintaining a clean separation between frontend and backend systems.
details.solution: Implemented a Next.js frontend with a dedicated Express.js backend, using Firebase Firestore for real-time data storage and Firebase Authentication for secure user access, alongside modular feature-based architecture.
features: View flights to and from South African airports
Responsive flight booking interface
Airport and airline news aggregation
Firebase-based authentication and data storage
South African localization (ZAR currency, regional news)
Modular frontend and backend project structure
Separated API service layer for scalability

title: GBV Awareness Platform
description: Cross-platform Flutter application (mobile, web, and desktop) designed to raise awareness about Gender-Based Violence, provide emergency and support resources, deliver educational content, and display real-time GBV-related statistics through a trauma-informed, safety-first experience.

details.challenge: Designing a platform that responsibly handles sensitive GBV-related content while remaining accessible, safe, and informative across multiple devices and regions.
details.solution: Built a shared Flutter architecture with Firebase-backed services, trauma-informed UX patterns, emergency safety mechanisms, and modular features for content, support resources, and real-time analytics.
features: Emergency contacts and one-tap GBV helplines
Support resources directory with region-based filtering
Quick Exit safety button for web users
Educational articles and blog hub with categories and tags
Real-time Firestore-backed dashboard with charts and KPIs
Product, FAQ, and testimonials modules
Cross-platform support for mobile, web, and desktop
Trauma-informed language, design, and safety disclaimers

title: Multi-Mode Calculator App
description: Responsive web-based calculator supporting Basic, Scientific, and Binary modes, with keyboard input, light/dark theme persistence, and advanced mathematical operations.

details.challenge: Implementing multiple calculator modes with distinct logic paths while keeping the UI intuitive, responsive, and fully keyboard-accessible.
details.solution: Built a modular JavaScript architecture that switches calculation engines per mode, supports binary conversions and operations, and persists user preferences using localStorage.
features: Basic arithmetic calculator
Scientific calculator with trigonometric and logarithmic functions
Binary conversion and binary math operations
Keyboard input support for all modes
Light and dark theme toggle with persistence
Responsive layout for desktop and mobile devices

title: MediConsult ‚Äî Medical Consultation Website
description: Responsive medical consultation web platform for booking online or physical appointments, accessing South African emergency contacts, browsing medical news, and requesting sick notes or referrals through an interactive service directory.

details.challenge: Creating a healthcare-focused web experience that balances usability, accessibility, and trust while presenting multiple services and sensitive medical workflows without backend infrastructure.
details.solution: Built a fully responsive, multi-page static web application with modular JavaScript handling dynamic content, appointment workflows, and interactive service descriptions.
features: Online and in-person consultation booking forms
Appointment tracking interface
Sick note and referral request system
Interactive services page with dynamic sidebar navigation
Medical news feed (placeholder logic)
South African emergency contact directory
Image carousel and featured services on homepage
Responsive, mobile-first layout

title: Pine City Zoo ‚Äî Interactive Website
description: Interactive, multi-page zoo website showcasing animals, attractions, events, live weather, real-time animal news, and visitor feedback through a playful, image-driven user experience.

details.challenge: Designing an engaging, information-rich website that balances entertainment and education while integrating external APIs and interactive UI elements.
details.solution: Implemented a multi-page, responsive site with JavaScript-powered interactivity, API-driven weather and news features, and consistent visual theming aligned with a real zoo experience.
features: Animal and attraction listing pages with hover interactions
Dedicated pages for individual animals
Live weather forecast with interactive UI
Real-time animal-related news integration
Visitor feedback form with star rating system
Responsive design using Flexbox and media queries
Embedded maps, external links, and social media integration

title: TaskFlow ‚Äî Productivity & Calendar-Based Task Manager
description: Modern productivity-focused task management application with daily, weekly, and monthly calendar views, real-time updates, and MongoDB-backed persistence. Designed to help users plan, track, and complete tasks efficiently.

details.challenge: Designing a productivity system that balances detailed task tracking with high-level planning views while maintaining real-time responsiveness and clean UX across devices.
details.solution: Built a Next.js 14 application using the App Router and API routes, backed by MongoDB and Mongoose, with modular calendar views, real-time UI updates, and analytics-driven task progress tracking.
features: Multi-view calendar system (day, week, month)
Task creation with date, time, priority, and descriptions
Real-time task status updates (Todo, In Progress, Done)
Task rescheduling with calendar and time picker
Progress tracking with duration analytics
Completed task archive
Motivational quotes to encourage productivity
Responsive, animation-enhanced UI
RESTful API routes for task CRUD operations

title: Siya ‚ù§Ô∏è Starr ‚Äî Romantic Anniversary Website
description: A heartfelt, story-driven anniversary website designed as a digital love letter, combining elegant visuals, smooth animations, and personal storytelling to celebrate a meaningful relationship.

details.challenge: Creating an emotionally expressive yet technically clean website that conveys intimacy, storytelling, and romance without overwhelming the user or sacrificing responsiveness.
details.solution: Designed and built a lightweight, responsive static website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, focusing on typography, color harmony, scroll-based animations, and clear narrative structure.
features: Soft pastel theme with romantic typography and styling
"Our Story" timeline with images and fade-in animations
Gallery of shared memories with photo placeholders
Personal love letter section
Scroll-triggered animations for immersive storytelling
Fully responsive design for mobile and desktop
Easy customization for images, text, and messages

title: Expense Tracker Web App (Alpha)
description: Flutter Web application for tracking and managing personal expenses with secure authentication, real-time Firestore sync, and a dashboard overview. Built as an alpha-stage prototype focusing on core functionality.

details.challenge: Building a reliable, real-time expense tracking system with secure authentication and cloud persistence while keeping the architecture simple enough for rapid iteration in an alpha release.
details.solution: Implemented a Flutter Web app backed by Firebase Authentication and Cloud Firestore, using provider-based state management and Firestore streams to keep expense data in sync across sessions and devices.
features: User registration, login, and logout with Firebase Authentication
Create, edit, and delete expenses with title, amount, category, and date
Real-time expense updates using Firestore streams
Dashboard view summarizing recorded expenses
Cloud-based persistence and cross-device data sync
Responsive Flutter Web UI
Modular project structure for scalability toward beta release

title: Intelligent Learning Model
description: Machine Learning model utilizing Large Language Models for conceptual processing combined with sound recognition techniques for adaptive learning input analysis.

details.challenge: Creating an adaptive learning system that understands both text and audio inputs
details.solution: Integrated LLM processing with sound recognition algorithms
features: Adaptive learning paths
Multi-modal input
Real-time feedback

title: NPO Management Platform
description: Full-stack non-profit organization management system with centralized data processing and real-time analytics dashboard.

details.challenge: Centralizing multiple data sources for non-profit operations
details.solution: Built unified platform with real-time data processing
features: Data centralization
Real-time analytics
User management

title: Financial Metrics Tracker
description: Personal expense tracking application with advanced data visualization for budget, savings, and investment monitoring.

details.challenge: Making financial data accessible and actionable for personal finance management
details.solution: Interactive visualizations with personalized insights and spending patterns
features: Expense tracking
Investment monitoring
Visual analytics
Budget planning

title: Creative Coding Framework
description: Interactive art generation framework using mathematical algorithms and real-time user input processing for generative art creation.

details.challenge: Bridging artistic expression with computational logic in an accessible way
details.solution: Framework for generative art with mathematical foundations and real-time rendering
features: Real-time rendering
Algorithmic art generation
Interactive controls
Export capabilities

title: Mobile Learning App
description: Cross-platform mobile application for personalized learning with adaptive content delivery and progress tracking.

details.challenge: Creating engaging mobile learning experiences that adapt to individual progress
details.solution: Cross-platform app with adaptive algorithms and gamified learning elements
features: Adaptive learning
Progress tracking
Gamification
Offline support

title: Data Visualization Library
description: Custom JavaScript library for creating interactive data visualizations with advanced chart types and real-time updates.

details.challenge: Simplifying complex data visualization creation for developers
details.solution: Modular library with pre-built chart components and customization options
features: Multiple chart types
Real-time updates
Custom styling
Responsive design
